comments:

The sample Java program is at:
http://www.eclipse.org/datatools/project_modelbase/modelbase_doc/sampleZip/ExampleForVendorPrimitiveWrite.java

The exception that Anil is getting is:

<http://www.eclipse.org/datatools/project_modelbase/modelbase_doc/sampleZip/ExampleForVendorPrimitiveWrite.java> 
(created a temp package, eclipse.hkolwalk); this may mean some 
inconsistency in the dependency with EMF layers (BasicEList class came 
from org.eclipse.emf.common_2.2.1.v200609210005.jar).
